data.title: bd-3aw: Fix find_thread_at_location to match lines within thread ranges
data.description: Changes SQL query to use range matching (selection_start <= line AND COALESCE(selection_end, selection_start) >= line) so commenting on a line within an existing thread range reuses the thread instead of creating a duplicate. Adds 4 tests covering exact match, within-range, outside-range, and resolved-thread cases.

data.reason: Security LGTM. SQL query uses parameterized params (no injection risk). COALESCE handles NULL selection_end correctly for single-line fallback. Input is u32â†’i64 cast (safe range). Test coverage is thorough with boundary cases.
